Michael,
I asked ICMA-RC for some insight on 457 plan evaluation, and they provided an excellent document listing evaluation criteria in several categories. You can find it in our document library at http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302576/457_Plan_Evaluation_Criteria
I hope you find it useful.
